channel.title: Bash on NZ's Digital Garden
channel.description: Recent content in Bash on NZ's Digital Garden

item.title: Bash
item.description: Bash 与 Bash 脚本 Shell Shell 脚本是解释执行的。 Shell scripts are interpreted, not compiled. The shell reads commands from the script line per line and searches for those commands on the system, while a compiler converts a program into machine readable form, an executable file - which may then be used in a shell script. Shell 有很多种，常
